hero.name: Your Name
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I create beautiful, functional, and responsive web applications with modern technologies and clean code.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: I've worked with a variety of technologies and frameworks to build modern web applications.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects. Each one was a unique challenge and learning experience.

items.title: E-Commerce Platform
items.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, cart functionality, and payment processing.

items.title: Task Management App
items.description: A Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, user collaboration, and real-time updates.

items.title: Fitness Tracker
items.description: A mobile app to track workouts, nutrition, and fitness progress with visual analytics and custom goal setting.

items.content: Working with this developer was a fantastic experience. They delivered our project on time, with excellent communication throughout the process.
items.author: Jane Smith

items.content: The attention to detail and technical expertise made all the difference in our application. We've seen a 40% increase in user engagement since launch.
items.author: John Peterson

items.content: Not only did they build exactly what we needed, but they provided valuable insights that improved our original concept substantially.
items.author: Sarah Johnson

mentorship.title: Mentorship Programs
mentorship.description: I offer personalized mentorship programs to help you grow your development skills and advance your career.

programs.title: Career Starter
programs.description: Perfect for beginners looking to break into tech with guided learning and project feedback.

programs.title: Professional Growth
programs.description: Designed for working developers who want to level up their skills and tackle new challenges.

programs.title: Project Accelerator
programs.description: Focused support for developers working on a specific project or learning a new technology.

cta.title: Ready to accelerate your growth?
cta.description: Book a free consultation to discuss your goals and find the right mentorship program for you.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to work together? I'd love to hear from you!
